text: hi there!
Hello.  How you doin
pretty good.  It looks like this chat is supposed to be to learn more about "Save the Children".  Have you ever heard of it?
Yes I am aware of that charity
It seems vaguely familiar but I never paid attention specifically.  Have you ever donated to them?
I have not but I have to some others recently
Do you feel that Save the Children is a good charity to give to?  From what I'm reading, it sounds like a great cause
I know a little can you maybe provide some info for me?
It seems to be international, and supports children in developing countries.  It's apparently very influential in war zones like Syria
Oh wow that is good to know.  I know Syria is a mess recently
Absolutely.  It says on their site that in the first two months of this year alone, 1000 children were killed or injured there
Ugh that is rough..  Nobody deserves that in this world
I can't imagine what that's like for the parents.  As a mom myself, I'm thinking about donating my earnings from this task to them
That sounds like a good idea so what amount is the max i can donate?
From what I can tell, we can donate anywhere from 0 to $2 (the full payment).  Then through the official Save the Children website, I'm sure there's no max (and there'd be a tax deduction)
Ok good to know.  Thank you very much forthat info you have been very helpful!  I will donate all of $2 then :)
How often do you donate to things like this?
There are always things in my community that I attend and donate as much as I can and donate my time as well at the local Salvation Army.

I usually give to animal charities like the local no-kill shelter, but it's always interesting to learn about new places to make an impact.  Do you feel that you donate more in terms of money, or in terms of volunteering your time?
More money but I enjoy giving the time
I'm usually pretty busy so try to donate a little here and there.  Anyway, glad to meet you!  Have a great rest of your night!
Nice to meet you as well have a good one :)
